message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront, but you'll have the advantage in later rounds.
Let's make a deal, Alice. I'm feeling generous, but time is money!
Time is money, Bob, and I'm feeling less generous. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your gains too!
Alice, let's end this. A 50/50 split is fair and avoids further losses from inflation.
